page.title: 20WE WENT FOR A WALK.
page.content: We go down the busy road towards the vale. There's the Fire Station. We went there once.Friendly firemen let us use the hoses. This council estate is nice and bright and clean. You cant hear the noisy road anymore. These terraces are too small for large families. I wonder where they live? No ball games allowed though. No vandals either - makes a change. Look at the way people take short cuts across the grass - ought to put paths where people want to go. Look,a wrecked van. No, it's a mobile shop! Going up the hill now, up the ridge where the old villages are. Posh houses up here.Wow! That one has a swimming pool - belongs to a footballer. I'd like to live there. Big houses up here, not many people about. There's a Rolls Royce! I've never been here before. Into some woods, great, just like the country.
